ygData.subject: RE: Yet another possible cheat
ygData.msgSnippet: About this, is the PBB on one specific eye or is it on any eye in the area (gorge/EK)? -Leod ... From: Jason Harrell [mailto:jharrell@planetalumni.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
About this, is the PBB on one specific eye or is it on any eye in the area
(gorge/EK)?

-Leod

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Harrell [mailto:jharrell@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 3:42 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: [EQCheats] Yet another possible cheat


From: "Jason Harrell" <jharrell@...>

Although many of you may know this:
/spoilerbufferon
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
When fighting evil eyes in the gorge the other night, I hit the sit button
while charmed somehow. The result was canceling the charm, which allowed me
to continue with my battle. I managed to do this repeatedly throughout the
night. This could be a coincidence or an actual bug in the game, I'm not
sure. Since I felt it was cheating, I quit doing it and left the gorge;
after all, I only wanted another Polished Bone Bracer ;)

Good Hunting All.
